generate_graph <- function(grupo,
                           anio_pivot,
                           expr_filter){
  
  colores <- switch (grupo,
                     `T-Maj` = "#FC0054",
                     `T-Min` = "#FB74a1",
                     `C-Maj` = "#1d0afc",
                     `C-Min` = "#7e74fb",
                     `C-Domestic` = "#FCD00A",
                     `Domestic` = "#FEE574"
  )
  

  
  comparativo <- compar3_placebo %>%
    rename_with(.cols = c("porcentage_ext",          
                          "porcentage_pff",
                          "porcentage_nac" ,
                          "group_assign",        
                          "total_income",    
                          "diferencia",         
                          "total_percent"),
                .fn = ~str_c(.x,"_post")) %>% 
    rename_with(.cols = matches("2012$"),
                .fn = ~str_replace(.x,"_2012","_pre")) %>% 
    ungroup() %>% 
    filter(eval(expr_filter),
           group_assign_pre == grupo) %>% 
    split(.$anio_fiscal) %>% 
    imap(~{
  
      compar <- .x
      
      if(grupo %in% c("T-Maj","T-Min")){
        
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_pff_post),
                      porcentage_pff_post - porcentage_pff_pre,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_pff_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_pff_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_pff_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon,
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Tax haven participation"
        
      }else if(grupo %in% c("C-Maj","C-Min")){
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_ext_post),
                      porcentage_ext_post - porcentage_ext_pre ,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_ext_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_ext_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_ext_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon, 
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Foreign participation"
        
      } else if(grupo %in% c("C-Domestic","Domestic")){
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_nac_post),
                      porcentage_nac_post - porcentage_nac_pre ,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_nac_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_nac_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_nac_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon, 
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Domestic participation"
      }
      
      
      return(compar)
      
    }) %>% 
    reduce(bind_rows)
  
     if(grupo %in% c("T-Maj","T-Min")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Tax haven participation"
        
      }else if(grupo %in% c("C-Maj","C-Min")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Foreign participation"
        
      } else if(grupo %in% c("C-Domestic","Domestic")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Domestic participation"
      }
  
  # browser()
  # comparativo <- read_rds("domestic_data")
  plot_df <- comparativo %>% 
    pivot_longer(cols = c(diferencia_level,diferencia_prop),
                 names_to = "class",
                 values_to = "valor") %>% 
    mutate(class = factor(class,
                          levels = c("diferencia_level","diferencia_prop"),

    split(.$class)
  
  plot_1 <- plot_df %>% 
    imap(.f = ~{
      .x %>%

              strip.text  = element_text(face = "bold")) +

             x = str_wrap(str_c(grupo_text ," (",.y,")"),30))
      
    }) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Difference in level",
           ~.x + 
             
             theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
                       strip.text = element_blank())) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Relative difference",
           ~.x + 
             scale_x_continuous(labels = ~percent(.x,accuracy = 0.1)) +
             theme(axis.title.y  = element_blank())) %>% 
    cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = .,ncol = 2)
  
    plot_2 <- plot_df %>% 
    imap(.f = ~{
      .x %>% 
        ggplot() +
        geom_histogram(aes(x = valor, fill = class,alpha = class)) +
        scale_alpha_manual(values = c("Difference in level" = 1, 
                                     "Relative difference" = 0.7)) +
        scale_fill_manual(values = colores) +
        facet_grid(anio_resumen~., scales = "free") +
        scale_y_continuous(labels = number) +
        theme_minimal() +
        theme(legend.position = "none",
              strip.text  = element_text(face = "bold"),
              axis.title = element_blank()) 
      
    }) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Difference in level",
           ~.x + 
             
             theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
                       strip.text = element_blank())) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Relative difference",
           ~.x + 
             scale_x_continuous(labels = ~percent(.x,accuracy = 0.1)) +
             theme(axis.title.y  = element_blank())) %>% 
    cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = .,ncol = 2)
  
  
  title <- ggdraw() +
    cowplot::draw_text(text = str_c("Change in ",grupo_text," for ",grupo),
                       size = 12)
  
   subtitle <- ggdraw() +
    cowplot::draw_text(text = str_c("Difference relative to ",anio_pivot),
                       size = 10)
   
   plot_out <- cowplot::plot_grid(title, subtitle, plot_1,rel_heights = c(0.8,0.5,10),ncol = 1)
   
   obj <- list(
     plot_out,
     plot_2
   )
   
   return(obj)
  
}

5.3 (Assets weigthed) Between post period years (2015-2017) and 2014

generate_graph <- function(grupo,
                           anio_pivot,
                           expr_filter){
  
  colores <- switch (grupo,
                     `T-Maj` = "#FC0054",
                     `T-Min` = "#FB74a1",
                     `C-Maj` = "#1d0afc",
                     `C-Min` = "#7e74fb",
                     `C-Domestic` = "#FCD00A",
                     `Domestic` = "#FEE574"
  )
  
  aps_core_pivot <- tabla_core_p %>% 
    filter(anio_fiscal == anio_pivot,
           group_assign == grupo)
  
  ids_core <- aps_core_pivot %>% 
    select(identificacion_informante_anon)
  
  comparativo <- tabla_core_p %>%
    ungroup() %>% 
    filter(eval(expr_filter)) %>% 
    split(.$anio_fiscal) %>% 
    imap(~{
      
      primera_post <-
        .x %>% 
        inner_join(ids_core) %>% 
        ungroup()
      
      
      primera_post <- primera_post %>% 
        rename_with(.cols = -identificacion_informante_anon,
                    ~str_c(.x,"_post"))
      
      aps_core_pivot <- aps_core_pivot %>% 
        rename_with(.cols = -identificacion_informante_anon,
                    ~str_c(.x,"_pre"))
      
      compar <- aps_core_pivot %>% 
        left_join(primera_post)
      
      
      if(grupo %in% c("T-Maj","T-Min")){
        
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_pff_post),
                      porcentage_pff_post - porcentage_pff_pre,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_pff_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_pff_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_pff_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon,
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre,
                 total_assets_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Tax haven participation"
        
      }else if(grupo %in% c("C-Maj","C-Min")){
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_ext_post),
                      porcentage_ext_post - porcentage_ext_pre ,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_ext_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_ext_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_ext_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon, 
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre,
                 total_assets_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Foreign participation"
        
      } else if(grupo %in% c("C-Domestic","Domestic")){
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_nac_post),
                      porcentage_nac_post - porcentage_nac_pre ,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_nac_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_nac_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_nac_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon, 
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre,
                 total_assets_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Domestic participation"
      }
      
      
      return(compar)
      
    }) %>% 
    reduce(bind_rows)
  
     if(grupo %in% c("T-Maj","T-Min")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Tax haven participation"
        
      }else if(grupo %in% c("C-Maj","C-Min")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Foreign participation"
        
      } else if(grupo %in% c("C-Domestic","Domestic")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Domestic participation"
      }
  
  # browser()
  # comparativo <- read_rds("domestic_data")
  plot_df <- comparativo %>% 
    pivot_longer(cols = c(diferencia_level,diferencia_prop),
                 names_to = "class",
                 values_to = "valor") %>% 
    mutate(class = factor(class,
                          levels = c("diferencia_level","diferencia_prop"),
                          labels = c("Difference in level", 
                                     "Relative difference"))) %>% 
    split(.$class)
  
  plot_1 <- plot_df %>% 
    imap(.f = ~{
      .x %>% 
        ggplot() +
        geom_histogram(aes(x = valor, fill = class,alpha = class,weight = total_assets_pre)) +
        scale_alpha_manual(values = c("Difference in level" = 1, 
                                     "Relative difference" = 0.7)) +
        scale_fill_manual(values = colores) +
        facet_grid(anio_resumen~., scales = "free") +
        scale_y_continuous(labels = number) +
        theme_minimal() +
        theme(legend.position = "none",
              strip.text  = element_text(face = "bold")) +
        labs(y = "Frecuency",
             x = str_wrap(str_c(grupo_text ," (",.y,")"),30))
      
    }) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Difference in level",
           ~.x + 
             
             theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
                       strip.text = element_blank())) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Relative difference",
           ~.x + 
             scale_x_continuous(labels = ~percent(.x,accuracy = 0.1)) +
             theme(axis.title.y  = element_blank())) %>% 
    cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = .,ncol = 2)
  
    plot_2 <- plot_df %>% 
    imap(.f = ~{
      .x %>% 
        ggplot() +
        geom_histogram(aes(x = valor, fill = class,alpha = class,weight = total_assets_pre)) +
        scale_alpha_manual(values = c("Difference in level" = 1, 
                                     "Relative difference" = 0.7)) +
        scale_fill_manual(values = colores) +
        facet_grid(anio_resumen~., scales = "free") +
        scale_y_continuous(labels = number) +
        theme_minimal() +
        theme(legend.position = "none",
              strip.text  = element_text(face = "bold"),
              axis.title = element_blank()) 
    }) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Difference in level",
           ~.x + 
             
             theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
                       strip.text = element_blank())) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Relative difference",
           ~.x + 
             scale_x_continuous(labels = ~percent(.x,accuracy = 0.1)) +
             theme(axis.title.y  = element_blank())) %>% 
    cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = .,ncol = 2)
  
  title <- ggdraw() +
    cowplot::draw_text(text = str_c("Change in assets weighted ",grupo_text," participation for ",grupo),
                       size = 12)
  
   subtitle <- ggdraw() +
    cowplot::draw_text(text = str_c("Difference relative to ",anio_pivot),
                       size = 10)
   
   plot_out <- cowplot::plot_grid(title, subtitle, plot_1,rel_heights = c(0.8,0.5,10),ncol = 1)
   
   obj <- list(
       plot_2,
       plot_out
     )
   
   return(
     obj
   )
  
}

5.4 (Assets weigthed) (Placebo) Between post period (2013-2014) and 2012

  • T-Maj
  • T-Min
  • C-Maj
  • C-Min
  • C-Domestic
  • Domestic
Code 
generate_graph <- function(grupo,
                           anio_pivot,
                           expr_filter){
  
  colores <- switch (grupo,
                     `T-Maj` = "#FC0054",
                     `T-Min` = "#FB74a1",
                     `C-Maj` = "#1d0afc",
                     `C-Min` = "#7e74fb",
                     `C-Domestic` = "#FCD00A",
                     `Domestic` = "#FEE574"
  )
  

  
  comparativo <- compar3_placebo %>%
    rename_with(.cols = c("porcentage_ext",          
                          "porcentage_pff",
                          "porcentage_nac" ,
                          "group_assign",        
                          "total_income",    
                          "diferencia",         
                          "total_percent"),
                .fn = ~str_c(.x,"_post")) %>% 
    rename_with(.cols = matches("2012$"),
                .fn = ~str_replace(.x,"_2012","_pre")) %>% 
    ungroup() %>% 
    filter(eval(expr_filter),
           group_assign_pre == grupo) %>% 
    split(.$anio_fiscal) %>% 
    imap(~{
  
      compar <- .x
      
      if(grupo %in% c("T-Maj","T-Min")){
        
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_pff_post),
                      porcentage_pff_post - porcentage_pff_pre,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_pff_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_pff_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_pff_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_pff_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon,
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre,
                 total_assets_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Tax haven participation"
        
      }else if(grupo %in% c("C-Maj","C-Min")){
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_ext_post),
                      porcentage_ext_post - porcentage_ext_pre ,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_ext_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_ext_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_ext_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_ext_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon, 
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre,
                 total_assets_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Foreign participation"
        
      } else if(grupo %in% c("C-Domestic","Domestic")){
        compar <- compar %>%
          mutate(
            diferencia_level = 
              if_else(!is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) & !is.na(porcentage_nac_post),
                      porcentage_nac_post - porcentage_nac_pre ,
                      NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = case_when(
              porcentage_nac_pre == 0 ~ 1,
              # porcentage_nac_post == 0 ~ -1,
              is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) ~ NA_real_,
              diferencia_level == 0 ~ 0,
              !is.na(porcentage_nac_pre) & !is.na(diferencia_level) ~ diferencia_level/porcentage_nac_pre,
                     TRUE ~ NA_real_),
            diferencia_prop = if_else(diferencia_prop > 1, 1.3, diferencia_prop),
            anio_resumen = .y) %>% 
          select(identificacion_informante_anon, 
                 diferencia_level,
                 diferencia_prop,
                 anio_resumen,
                 group_assign_pre,
                 total_assets_pre)
        
        # browser()
        
        grupo_text <- "Domestic participation"
      }
      
      
      return(compar)
      
    }) %>% 
    reduce(bind_rows)
  
     if(grupo %in% c("T-Maj","T-Min")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Tax haven participation"
        
      }else if(grupo %in% c("C-Maj","C-Min")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Foreign participation"
        
      } else if(grupo %in% c("C-Domestic","Domestic")){
        
        grupo_text <- "Domestic participation"
      }
  
  # browser()
  # comparativo <- read_rds("domestic_data")
  plot_df <- comparativo %>% 
    pivot_longer(cols = c(diferencia_level,diferencia_prop),
                 names_to = "class",
                 values_to = "valor") %>% 
    mutate(class = factor(class,
                          levels = c("diferencia_level","diferencia_prop"),
                          labels = c("Difference in level", 
                                     "Relative difference"))) %>% 
    split(.$class)
  
  plot_1 <- plot_df %>% 
    imap(.f = ~{
      .x %>% 
        ggplot() +
        geom_histogram(aes(x = valor, fill = class,alpha = class,weight = total_assets_pre)) +
        scale_alpha_manual(values = c("Difference in level" = 1, 
                                     "Relative difference" = 0.7)) +
        scale_fill_manual(values = colores) +
        facet_grid(anio_resumen~., scales = "free") +
        scale_y_continuous(labels = number) +
        theme_minimal() +
        theme(legend.position = "none",
              strip.text  = element_text(face = "bold")) +
        labs(y = "Frecuency",
             x = str_wrap(str_c(grupo_text ," (",.y,")"),30))
      
    }) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Difference in level",
           ~.x + 
             
             theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
                       strip.text = element_blank())) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Relative difference",
           ~.x + 
             scale_x_continuous(labels = ~percent(.x,accuracy = 0.1)) +
             theme(axis.title.y  = element_blank())) %>% 
    cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = .,ncol = 2)
  
   plot_2 <- plot_df %>% 
    imap(.f = ~{
      .x %>% 
        ggplot() +
        geom_histogram(aes(x = valor, fill = class,alpha = class,weight = total_assets_pre)) +
        scale_alpha_manual(values = c("Difference in level" = 1, 
                                     "Relative difference" = 0.7)) +
        scale_fill_manual(values = colores) +
        facet_grid(anio_resumen~., scales = "free") +
        scale_y_continuous(labels = number) +
        theme_minimal() +
        theme(legend.position = "none",
              strip.text  = element_text(face = "bold"),
              axis.title = element_blank()) 
      
    }) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Difference in level",
           ~.x + 
             
             theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
                       strip.text = element_blank())) %>% 
    map_at(.at = "Relative difference",
           ~.x + 
             scale_x_continuous(labels = ~percent(.x,accuracy = 0.1)) +
             theme(axis.title.y  = element_blank())) %>% 
    cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = .,ncol = 2)
  
  title <- ggdraw() +
    cowplot::draw_text(text = str_c("Change in assets weighted ",grupo_text," for ",grupo),
                       size = 12)
  
   subtitle <- ggdraw() +
    cowplot::draw_text(text = str_c("Difference relative to ",anio_pivot),
                       size = 10)
   
   plot_out <- cowplot::plot_grid(title, subtitle, plot_1,rel_heights = c(0.8,0.5,10),ncol = 1)
   
   obj <- list(
       plot_out,
       plot_2
     )
   
   return(
     obj
   )
  
}


plot_print <- generate_graph(grupo = "T-Maj",
               anio_pivot = 2012,
               expr_filter = rlang::parse_expr("anio_fiscal %in% c(2013,2014)"))

6 Comparison of the distribution of prominent participation at the baseline

Code 
tabla <- read_rds(here("01_DATA/APS/base_datos_treat_assign.rds"))

tabla_reduced <- tabla %>% 
  filter(anio_fiscal <= 2014) %>% 
  mutate(grupo_compar = if_else(anio_fiscal == 2014,"Año: 2014","Promedio: 2012-2013"),
         grupo_compar = factor(grupo_compar),
         porcentage_pff = porcentage_pff/100,
         porcentage_ext = porcentage_ext/100,
         porcentage_nac = porcentage_nac/100,
         group_assign = factor(group_assign,
                               levels = c("T-Maj",
                                          "T-Min",
                                          "C-Maj",
                                          "C-Min",
                                          "C-Domestic",
                                          "Domestic")),
         porcentaje = case_when(group_assign %in% c("T-Maj",
                                                    "T-Min") ~ porcentage_pff,
                                group_assign %in% c("C-Maj",
                                                    "C-Min") ~ porcentage_ext,
                                group_assign %in% c("C-Domestic",
                                                    "Domestic") ~ porcentage_nac)
         ) 


minimal <- tabla_reduced %>% 
  group_by(identificacion_informante_anon,
           grupo_compar, group_assign) %>% 
  summarise(valor = mean(porcentaje,na.rm = T)) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = valor, fill = grupo_compar),
                 position = "identity",
                 bins = 30,
                 alpha = 0.6) +
  facet_wrap(.~group_assign,nrow = 3,ncol = 2,scales = "free") +
  theme_minimal() 

ggsave(plot = minimal,"output/Graficos/plot_6_domestic.png")

minimal +
  labs(fill = "Comparation",
       title = "Distribution of prominent participation in each group in the core sample",
       caption = str_wrap("For the T-Maj and T-Min the plot show the distribution of the tax haven participation of the firms at the year indicated. In other hand for the groups C-Min and C-Maj the distribuition of the foreign participation is presented. At least for the Domestic and C-Domestic groups the domestic participation is presented", 110)) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        plot.caption = element_text(hjust = 0.5))

write_rds(tabla_core,here("01_DATA/APS/core_sample_assigned.rds"))
